EmailTemplate.name: generatr Booking form mail
EmailTemplate.subject: Booking Form for {!Project}, {!Unit}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!SM},
It gives us immense pleasure to welcome you at {!Project}, our flagship development!
We congratulate you on your latest purchase! We are excited to be a part of your journey towards your dream home.
We would like to take this opportunity to share with you a copy of your booking form for your reference.
In case of concerns, please feel free to contact {!Opportunity.OwnerId} on {!Opportunity.OwnerId}. {!Opportunity.OwnerId} can also be reached on {!Opportunity.OwnerId}.
We once again thank you for choosing {!Project} as the destination for your dream home!
Warm Regards, {!Booking__c.Project_Name__c.Builder_Organization__c.Name}
